products.name: Strawberry Lip Scrub
products.description: Gently exfoliate and nourish your lips with our sweet strawberry lip scrub. Made with natural sugar crystals and vitamin E to reveal soft, smooth lips.

products.name: Vanilla Bean Lip Scrub
products.description: Indulge in the warm, comforting scent of vanilla while buffing away dry skin. Leaves lips feeling silky and hydrated.

products.name: Rose Petal Lip Gloss
products.description: A stunning rose-tinted gloss that adds a beautiful sheen with a hint of color. Non-sticky formula keeps lips moisturized all day.

products.name: Clear Shimmer Lip Gloss
products.description: Add a touch of sparkle with our clear shimmer gloss. Perfect worn alone or over your favorite lipstick for an extra glossy finish.

products.name: Classic Nude Lip Liner
products.description: Define and shape your lips with our creamy nude lip liner. Long-lasting formula prevents feathering and keeps lipstick in place.

products.name: Berry Blush Lip Liner
products.description: A gorgeous berry shade that pairs perfectly with our lip glosses. Smooth application and all-day wear.

products.name: Overnight Honey Lip Mask
products.description: Wake up to plump, hydrated lips with our overnight honey lip mask. Enriched with shea butter and natural honey extract.

products.name: Collagen Boost Lip Mask
products.description: Intensive lip treatment with collagen peptides to plump and smooth fine lines. Use 2-3 times weekly for best results.

products.name: Lavender Dreams Hand Cream
products.description: Luxurious hand cream infused with calming lavender essential oil. Fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula for silky soft hands.

products.name: Shea Butter Intensive Hand Cream
products.description: Deep moisturizing hand cream with pure shea butter. Perfect for dry, cracked hands. Provides 24-hour hydration.

products.name: Hydrating Glow Face Mask
products.description: Revitalize your skin with our hydrating face mask. Packed with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C for a radiant, dewy glow.

products.name: Charcoal Detox Face Mask
products.description: Deep cleansing charcoal mask that draws out impurities and unclogs pores. Leaves skin feeling refreshed and refined.

products.name: Floral Essence Perfume
products.description: A delicate blend of rose, jasmine, and peony notes. Light, feminine fragrance perfect for everyday wear.

products.name: Vanilla Musk Perfume
products.description: Warm and sensual fragrance with notes of vanilla, amber, and sandalwood. Long-lasting scent that lingers beautifully.

products.name: Whipped Body Butter
products.description: Luxuriously rich whipped body butter coming soon! Made with organic ingredients for ultimate skin nourishment.

products.name: Dewy Setting Spray
products.description: Keep your makeup flawless all day with our setting spray. Coming soon with a refreshing rose water formula.

categories.name: Lip Gloss
categories.description: Add shine and color to your lips
